data.title: RR Auction: December 2017 Fine Autographs and Artifacts
data.meta_description: Highlighted by featured ‘Science and Technology’ and ‘Animation’ sections, RR Auction’s December Fine Autographs and Artifacts Auction boasts a wea...
data.text: Highlighted by featured ‘Science and Technology’ and ‘Animation’ sections, RR Auction’s December Fine Autographs and Artifacts Auction boasts a wealth of rare and remarkable material. In addition to letters by Albert Einstein and original artwork used in the iconic productions of Walt Disney Studios, this sale includes maps used on the moon during Apollo 15, an original Force print of the Declaration of Independence, a superb Frederic Chopin publishing document, a check signed by President Abraham Lincoln, a handwritten letter by Oscar Wilde, and a variety of other museum-quality historical items. RR Auction is a globally recognized and trusted auction house specializing in historical autographs and artifacts. Join us as we make history selling history in December 2017.
